name: PRISMAL RUN
description:
Summary:

Prismal Run is a platformer with procedural obstacles trying to  prevent the player to get through the level.

An aural-proportioned prism will need to jump and stop to get the best score and pass the most tiles with the minimum time.

Controls:

Press SPACE or W to jump, S to stop

Enjoy!

A game by Àlex Pérez, Bernat Riu and Guillem Serra
